item.title: Interview with Prathun on Everquest Raids
item.description: Today we have a Mobhunter Exclusive interview with Prathun, the lead Everquest raid designer and most experienced raid designer in the world for massive online games.

item.title: The Great Depths Reitemization
item.description: This week SOE updated over one thousand items in the Depths of Darkhollow expansion. Today we discuss these changes and what they mean for Everquest overall.

item.title: Interview with Maddoc on Live Events
item.description: Today Loral interviews Jason Mash, Maddoc, a senior designer for Everquest on the topic of Everquest's Live Events.

item.title: The Patch of Hallow's Eve 2005
item.description: This week we take a discuss the first major patch since the release of Depths, the Hanvar changes in Anguish, the Depths loot situation, the Walk of Game contest, the EQ Halloween festivities, an the most recent developer's chat.

item.title: Two Contests and the Lost Files of Moorgard
item.description: Today we officially announce two Mobhunter contests and the great finding of the Lost Files of Moorgard.

item.title: Sinkholes in the Depths
item.description: Depths of Darkhollow opened up some of the most exciting and innovative features we have seen in any massive online game. No expansion is perfect, however. This article looks at three of the largest problems in Depths of Darkhollow: disappointing rewards, unbalanced missions, and low powered high level spirit shrouds.

item.title: Summit Report, September 2005
item.description: Loral returns from the west with tales of the September 2005 Everquest Summit. Read on for details on the summit discussions, some editorial fluff, and exclusive juicy details on a new and most excellent feature soon to be released.

item.title: Loral's Evil Agenda, September 2005
item.description: With the recent release of Depths of Darkhollow and a new Everquest community summit coming up this week, now is the perfect time for Loral to once again outline his evil plans.

item.title: Onward into the Depths
item.description: Today we look at some of the initial issues of Depths of Darkhollow and begin to prepare for a new EQ community summit.

item.title: Depths of Darkhollow: In-depth Preview
item.description: With the release of Depths of Darkhollow early next week and a release of the beta non-disclosure agreement, Loral now brings you an in-depth preview of Depths of Darkhollow.

item.title: Shrouds, Monster Missions, AAs, EQ2, and WoW
item.description: Today, as we glance to the horizon for the coming of Depths of Darkhollow, we discuss a recent developer's chat, some EQ community articles, some EQ2 news, and some WoW news.

item.title: News After the Fall of Gukta
item.description: Today we have a short update on the latest happenings in our constantly changing world of Norrath including the fall of Gukta, more on the Boar, and some interesting articles and rumors on the internets.

item.title: Riddles in the Depths
item.description: In this week's news roundup we look at the progression of the War of Antonica and dig into some of the clues given at the most recent EQ Stratics Developer Chat. Learn the secrets of the Clockwork Boar!

item.title: The Rising of the Trolls
item.description: This week we offer up a news roundup of the latest happenings in Norrath including the most recent patch, a couple of news articles of note, and the most recent War of Norrath. Enjoy!

item.title: The Patch that Changed Everquest
item.description: This week SOE released a patch that forever changed the face of Everquest. While some of the features may seem subtle to some and even annoying to others, when one digs into what these changes mean, one sees a much more usable game and a tighter community.
